title: Rugby World Cup 2019 quarter-final predictions: Our team of experts name their winners... do they predict an England or Australia win?
text:
The pool stages of the 2019 Rugby World Cup in Japan are over, and the knockout stage is set to be one of the most competitive ever, with not much between many of the teams, and several matches set to go down to the wire.

We have given our Telegraph Sport rugby columnists the tough task of making their predictions for this weekend's matches, while the majority has ruled in favour of English and Welsh victories, there is optimism for the chances of Ireland and Japan upsetting the much-vaunted southern hemisphere duo of New Zealand and South Africa.

Mick Cleary's predictions

England vs...
